mapper.insert: insert into product (productNum, productName, productPrice, productImage, productCnt) values (#{productNum},#{productName},#{productPrice}, #{productImage}, #{productCnt})
mapper.update: update product set productNum=#{productNum}, productName=#{productName}, productPrice=#{productPrice}, productImage=#{productImage}, productCnt=#{productCnt} where productNum = #{productNum}
mapper.select: select productNum, productName, productPrice, productImage, productCnt from product
